[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]The Digital SLR adapter connects cameras to Slit Lamps and Surgical Microscopes that can mount a beamsplitter. Interchangeable lenses and mounts make it compatible with almost any camera including 4k Blackmagic video cameras.

  • Compatible with APS-C, MFT, and Full Frame cameras
  • Focus-control to fine tune your image
  • X/Y adjustment to center your view
  • Adjustable iris to increase depth of field
  • Can mount to any Zeiss-style beamsplitter exit port
  • Interchangeable lenses and mounts for the widest range of camera compatibility
  • Footswitch available for Canon cameras

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”73040,72861,72291″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1576230022165{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Digital SLR Adapter

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Don’t get locked into your OEM’s integrated product. Experience 4k video and photography on your slit lamp or microscope with the freedom to choose and upgrade the camera. If you already have a camera it will likely be compatible, and if you need a camera we are a Blackmagic distributor. Depending on your camera features such as recording, live HDMI view, and wireless file transfer are available.

In addition to the iris, focus, and centration settings on the Accu-Beam you have full control of the camera settings. For Canon cameras we also offer a footswitch for hands-free photography.

Part # 8194101 – Canon SLR adapter
Part # 8194101-340 – Canon Full Frame SLR adapter
Part # FS101 – Canon footswitch
Part # 8194102 – Nikon SLR adapter
Part # 8194102-340 – Nikon Full Frame SLR Adapter
Part # 8194103 – Minolta/Sony SLR Adapter
Part # 8194104 – Olympus SLR Adapter
Part # 8194105 – Pentax SLR Adapter
Part # 8194106 – Sony (NEX) SLR Adapter
Part # 8194106-340 – Sony (NEX) Full Frame SLR Adapter
Part # 8194107 – Micro 4/3″ SLR Adapter
Part # 8194109 – Blackmagic SLR Adapter

U.S. Patent No. 5,264,92[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54bfd2-bb87″][vc_column_text]Compatible with Zeiss, Alcon, Leica/WILD, Moller-Wedel/Haag Streit, Topcon, Vasconcellos, Marco, Reichert, Shin Nippon, Takagi, Nidek, CSO, Appasamy, Burton, Woodlyn, KAPS, Seiler, Global and other slit lamp or microscope manufacturers.

Compatible with Canon, Blackmagic, Nikon, Minolta/Sony Alpha-series, Olympus, Pentax, Sony NEX-series and Micro 4/3″ Digital SLR cameras

Haag-Streit Disclaimer[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dbfd2-bb87″][vc_column_text]The Digital SLR Adapter is a class 1 device, and is approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014abfd2-bb87″][vc_column_text] All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
